TopicTitle: sorry don't follow KSP much anymore been busy

Articles.Content: but when is the release date for 1.0? thanks
They dont release them, but when it go's into experimentals it usually means that its aboult a week away.

> 
> They dont release them, but when it go's into experimentals it usually means that its aboult a week away.

In this case more like two to a month...
I think this time they are doing the test build separately for different features... maybe?
Squad never announces release dates, as a matter of policy.
